text: tomadera upare kono aparadha habe na yadi ba tomara tomadera prabhura kache daulata kamanora cesta karo. Tarapara tomara yakhana araphata theke jota bedhe phimrabe takhana masa'arila-harama era nikate allahâ€Œke smarana karo; ara tamke smarana karo yemana tini tomadera pathanirdesa diyechena, yadi'o era age nihsandeha tomara chile pathabhrastadera antarbhukta.
